description: Our newest PA is not working out so well, so we ask Sandra to come help train him. After teaching him the proper use of a broom, she introduces him to our collection of dildos, restraints and whips. Beaten, ass fucked and humiliated, the PA gets a chance to actually fuck the beautiful Mistress, if he can perform to her standards.
title: So, you wanna be a P.A.?
